verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The B-I-B-L-E
Yes, that's the book for me
I stand alone on the word of God
The B-I-B-L-E

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The B-I-B-L-E
It is God's word to me
I will obey God's holy word
The B-I-B-L-E

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The B-I-B-L-E
Yes, it's the book for me
I love to hear the stories from
The B-I-B-L-E

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
The B-I-B-L-E
Its stories help me see
The love of Jesus, God's only Son
The B-I-B-L-E

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
The B-L-O-O-D
The blood that cleanses me
I stand alone on the cornerstone
The B-L-O-O-D
